actions.description: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Hooves

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Serrated Tail

actions.description: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Lightning Lance (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
